item.title: By: keith
item.dc:creator: keith
item.description:
Hello Haley, Even though I'm not teaching this course this semester, I'm glad that you have found it useful. You might try searching Google Scholar (http://scholar.google.com)/ for recent articles about trafficking to see how different people are thinking about the topic.
Search terms that might be useful: human rights, sex work, forced migration, borders, carceral, literature review.
And some literature to get you started: http://www.jstor.org/stable/10.1086/652918 http://books.google.com/books/about/Sex_at_the_Margins.html?id=4UR_K7rSLrYC http://www.scribd.com/doc/96643262/Gridlock-Mahdavi-0804772207 http://books.google.com/books?id=FSHaAAAAMAAJ http://www.palgraveconnect.com/pc/doifinder/10.1057/9781403937865
item.content:encoded:
Hello Haley, Even though I’m not teaching this course this semester, I’m glad that you have found it useful. You might try searching Google Scholar (http://scholar.google.com/) for recent articles about trafficking to see how different people are thinking about the topic.

Search terms that might be useful: human rights, sex work, forced migration, borders, carceral, literature review.

And some literature to get you started:
http://www.jstor.org/stable/10.1086/652918
http://books.google.com/books/about/Sex_at_the_Margins.html?id=4UR_K7rSLrYC
http://www.scribd.com/doc/96643262/Gridlock-Mahdavi-0804772207
http://books.google.com/books?id=FSHaAAAAMAAJ
http://www.palgraveconnect.com/pc/doifinder/10.1057/9781403937865

item.title: By: Haley
item.dc:creator: Haley
item.description: What are good websites for human trafficking? I need somewhere to start for my term paper.
item.content:encoded: What are good websites for human trafficking? I need somewhere to start for my term paper.
